items.sentence: Why do you want to learn a foreign language?

Their friendship gradually turned into love.
There are fifty states in the United States.
There are some tomatoes in the refrigerator.
There has to be a first time for everything.
There is only one store on the whole island.
I\'ll call them tomorrow when I return home.
I\'ll never have to worry about money again.

If you want to dance, let\'s dance together.

Let\'s wait a few days and see what happens.
I liked walking alone on the deserted beach.
